PageWidgetPortable.Title: Histórico
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_STATUS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'CP_ORDENSCOMPRA') AND A.HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1951_at2846_hs38bb46b3.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Itens de OC
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.ORDEMCOMPRA = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA) AND A.PRODUTO = (SELECT PRODUTO FROM LC_REQUISICAOITENS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICAOITENS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1530_at2844_hs76202e69.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
